mapper.select: select b.nick_name , a.* from b_board a, member b where a.id = b.id
mapper.insert: insert into b_board (bb_idx, id, title, content, start_date, end_date, place, latitude, longitude, country, address) values(#{bb_idx}, 'TEST', #{title}, #{content}, #{start_date}, #{end_date}, #{place}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, #{country}, #{address})
